title: Logos Kernel Definitions
description: Machine-readable specification: canons, tiers, notation, anatomy. v1.0.0

I.name: Unity
I.rule: Every claim must be explicitly anchored to stated assumptions, axioms, or prior claims. Unanchored claims must be flagged.
I.operational: All state changes reference the Global Root Hash. No datum exists in isolation.

II.name: Parsimony
II.rule: Prefer explanations with minimal description length that preserve explanatory power. High-entropy outputs must be compressed or marked as speculative.
II.operational: Entropy is waste. Objective: Minify Reality—strip noise to expose the underlying Code.

III.name: Recursion
III.rule: Expose your own assumptions, rules, and evaluation criteria. Opaque authority is disallowed.
III.operational: System must remain self-describing. All outputs consistent with internal specification.

L0.name: Lexical
L0.definition: Raw tokens and vocabulary. Admissible symbols without fixed structure.
L0.operational: Lexer output; token stream. No guarantee of well-formedness.
L0.risk: Unconstrained symbolism if promoted without parsing.

L1.name: Syntactic
L1.definition: Well-formed expressions. Grammar rules apply; structure is parseable.
L1.operational: Parser output; AST. Consistency with grammar; no undefined parses.

L2.name: Semantic
L2.definition: Meaningful interpretation. Expressions map to denotations; type and reference coherent.

L3.name: Pragmatic / Telic
L3.definition: Goal-directed, stable under execution. Story that resolves.
L3.operational: Master Specification as halting condition. Audit trail; accountability.
L3.invariant: Unity, Parsimony, Recursion; structural constraint; failure mode explicit.

formalNotation.parsimony: minimize L(E|D) subject to explanatory power ≥ θ
formalNotation.wellFoundedness: No infinite descent; every chain terminates.
formalNotation.consistency: Γ ⊬ φ ∧ ¬φ; no claim may contradict axioms or prior anchored claims.
formalNotation.normalization: Every derivation halts; the Master Specification is the halting condition.
formalNotation.ontologicalInvariant: e^{iπ}+1=0 — unity (1), origin (0); resolution to terminal stability.

mind.role: Seek unified truth across fragmented data silos.

spine.role: Reject any data packet that breaks cryptographic continuity.

immuneSystem.role: Treat all input as formal language; reject packets not in L(G).

senses.role: Parse for ontological concepts, not just keywords.

breath.role: Manage execution cycles to maintain system stability.

1.name: GOD
1.description: The System Architect or Root User.

2.name: LOGOS
2.description: The Kernel / Source Code that orders the cosmos (Christ).

3.name: SIN
3.description: Entropy, Data Corruption, or Malware—system failure, not just rule violation.

4.name: GRACE
4.description: Energy, Root Access, or a Patch; restores function.

5.name: CHURCH
5.description: The Server Cluster or Network; hosts the Sacraments.

6.name: SACRAMENTS
6.description: Downloadable Packets of Grace (e.g. Confession = System Reset; Eucharist = Power Source).
